verses.verse: Paul, <WG3972> Apostle <WG652> Of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> By The <WG1223> Will <WG2307> Of God <WG2316> ' According To <WG2596> Promise <WG1860> Of Life <WG2222> Which Is <WG3588> In <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus, <WG2424>

To Timothy My <WG5095> Beloved <WG27> Child : <WG5043> Grace, <WG5485> Mercy, <WG1656> Peace <WG1515> From <WG575> God The <WG2316> Father <WG3962> And <WG2532> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> <WG3588> <WG2962> Our Lord. <WG2257>

<WG5485> I Am Thankful <WG2192> <WG3588> To God, <WG2316> Whom <WG3739> I Serve <WG3000> From My <WG575> Forefathers <WG4269> With <WG1722> Pure <WG2513> Conscience, <WG4893> How <WG5613> Unceasingly <WG88> I Have <WG2192> The <WG3588> Of <WG4012> Thee <WG4675> Remembrance <WG3417> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG1162> My Supplications <WG3450> Night <WG3571> And <WG2532> Day, <WG2250>
Longing <WG1971> Thee <WG4571> To See, <WG1492> Remembering <WG3415> Thy <WG4675> <WG3588> Tears, <WG1144> That <WG2443> With Joy <WG5479> I May Be Filled; <WG4137>

Remembrance <WG5280> Taking <WG2983> Of The <WG3588> In <WG1722> Thee <WG4671> Unfeigned <WG505> Faith, <WG4102> Which <WG3748> Dwelt <WG1774> First <WG4412> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG3125> Thy Grandmother <WG4675> Lois <WG3090> And <WG2532> In <WG3588> Mother <WG3384> Thy <WG4675> Eunice, <WG2131> <WG3982> And I Am Persuaded <WG1161> That <WG3754> Also <WG2532> In <WG1722> Thee. <WG4671>

' For <WG1223> Which <WG3739> Cause <WG156> I Remind <WG363> Thee <WG4571> To Kindle Up <WG329> The <WG3588> Gift <WG5486> <WG3588> Of God <WG2316> Which <WG3739> Is <WG2076> In <WG1722> Thee <WG4671> By <WG1223> The <WG3588> Laying On <WG1936> <WG3588> <WG5495> Of My Hands. <WG3450>

<WG3756> For Not <WG1063> Gave <WG1325> Us <WG2254> <WG3588> God <WG2316> A Spirit <WG4151> Of Cowardice, <WG1167> But <WG235> Of Power, <WG1411> And <WG2532> Of Love, <WG26> And <WG2532> Of Wise Discretion. <WG4995>

Not <WG3361> Therefore <WG3767> Thou Shouldest Be Ashamed Of <WG1870> The <WG3588> Testimony <WG3142> <WG3588> <WG2962> Of Our Lord, <WG2257> Nor <WG3366> Me <WG1691> <WG3588> <WG1198> His Prisoner; <WG846> But <WG235> Suffer Evils Along With <WG4777> The <WG3588> Glad Tidings <WG2098> According To <WG2596> Power <WG1411> God's; <WG2316>

Who <WG3588> Saved <WG4982> Us <WG2248> And <WG2532> Called <WG2564> Us With A Calling <WG2821> Holy, <WG40> Not <WG3756> According To <WG2596> <WG3588> <WG2041> Our Works, <WG2257> But <WG235> ' According To <WG2596> His Own <WG2398> Purpose <WG4286> And <WG2532> Grace, <WG5485> Which <WG3588> Was Given <WG1325> Us <WG2254> In <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> Before <WG4253> <WG5550> The Ages Of Time, <WG166>

<WG5319> But Made Manifest <WG1161> Now <WG3568> By <WG1223> The <WG3588> Appearing <WG2015> <WG3588> <WG4990> Of Our Saviour <WG2257> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> <WG2673> Who Annulled <WG3303> <WG3588> Death, <WG2288> Brought To Light <WG5461> And <WG1161> Life <WG2222> And <WG2532> Incorruptibility <WG861> By <WG1223> The <WG3588> Glad Tidings; <WG2098>
To <WG1519> Which <WG3739> Was Appointed <WG5087> I 1473 P-1NS A Herald 2783 N-NSM And 2532 CONJ Apostle 652 N-NSM And 2532 CONJ Teacher 1320 N-NSM Of The Nations. 1484 N-GPN

' For <WG1223> Which <WG3739> Cause <WG156> Also <WG2532> These Things <WG5023> I Suffer; <WG3958> ' But <WG235> Not <WG3756> I Am Ashamed; <WG1870> <WG1492> For I Know <WG1063> Whom <WG3739> I Have Believed, <WG4100> And <WG2532> Am Persuaded <WG3982> That <WG3754> Able <WG1415> He Is <WG2076> The <WG3588> Deposit Committed To Him <WG3866> Of Me <WG3450> To Keep <WG5442> For <WG1519> That <WG1565> <WG3588> Day. <WG2250>

A Delineation <WG5296> Have <WG2192> Of Sound <WG5198> Words, <WG3056> Which Words <WG3739> ' From <WG3844> Me <WG1700> Thou Didst Hear, <WG191> In <WG1722> Faith <WG4102> And <WG2532> Love <WG26> Which Are <WG3588> In <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424>
The <WG3588> Good <WG2570> Deposit Committed To Thee <WG3872> Keep <WG5442> By The <WG1223> Spirit <WG4151> Holy <WG40> Which <WG3588> Dwells <WG1774> In <WG1722> Us. <WG2254>

Thou Knowest <WG1492> This, <WG5124> That <WG3754> Turned Away From <WG654> Me <WG3165> All <WG3956> Who Are <WG3588> In <WG1722> <WG3588> Asia, <WG773> Of Whom <WG3739> Is <WG2076> Phygellus <WG5436> And <WG2532> Hermogenes. <WG2061>

May Grant <WG1325> Mercy <WG1656> The <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> To The <WG3588> Of Onesiphorus <WG3683> House, <WG3624> Because <WG3754> Oft <WG4178> Me <WG3165> He Refreshed, <WG404> And <WG2532> <WG3588> <WG254> My Chain <WG3450> <WG3756>, Was Not Ashamed Of; <WG1870>
But <WG235> Having Been <WG1096> In <WG1722> Rome, <WG4516> More Diligently <WG4706> He Sought Out <WG2212> Me <WG3165> And <WG2532> Found Me <WG2147>

May Grant <WG1325> To Him <WG846> The <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> To Find <WG2147> Mercy <WG1656> From The <WG3844> Lord <WG2962> In <WG1722> That <WG1565> <WG3588> Day <WG2250> And <WG2532> How Much <WG3745> In <WG1722> Ephesus <WG2181> He Served <WG1247> Better Than I Need Say <WG957> <WG957> Thou <WG4771> Knowest. <WG1097>
